name: Khmer Music
description: Music of the Khmer people, the majority ethnic group of Cambodia.

children.name: Cambodian Pop
children.description: Popular music produced in Cambodia or by Khmer people.

children.name: Kantruem
children.description: Form of fast-paced dance music played by the Khmer people of northeast Thailand.

children.name: Khmer Folk Music
children.description: Folk of the Khmer people, who mainly reside in Cambodia.

children.name: Pinpeat
children.description: Orchestra of wind and percussion instruments having its origins in the Khmer Empire era.
